about.summary: Resampling procedures to assess the stability of selected variables with additional finite sample error control for high-dimensional variable selection procedures such as Lasso or boosting. Both, standard stability selection (Meinshausen & Buhlmann, 2010, <doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2010.00740.x>)  and complementary pairs stability selection with improved error bounds  (Shah & Samworth, 2013, <doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2011.01034.x>) are implemented. The package can be combined with arbitrary user specified variable selection approaches.

name: r-stabs
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.6-3' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-stabs
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: stabs_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/stabs_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/stabs/stabs_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e961ae21d45babc1162b6eeda874c4e3677fc286fd06f5427f071ad7a5064a9f

build:
  noarch: generic
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1003
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('stabs')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('stabs')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/hofnerb/stabs
  license: GPL-2
  summary: Resampling procedures to assess the stability of selected variables with additional
    finite sample error control for high-dimensional variable selection procedures such
    as Lasso or boosting. Both, standard stability selection (Meinshausen & Buhlmann,
    2010, <doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2010.00740.x>)  and complementary pairs stability
    selection with improved error bounds  (Shah & Samworth, 2013, <doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2011.01034.x>)
    are implemented. The package can be combined with arbitrary user specified variable
    selection approaches.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
